s = input()
k = int(input())

for i in range(10):
    s = s.replace("2", "22")

for i in range(10):
    s = s.replace("3", "33")

for i in range(10):
    s = s.replace("4", "44")

for i in range(10):
    s = s.replace("5", "55")

for i in range(10):
    s = s.replace("6", "66")

for i in range(10):
    s = s.replace("7", "77")

for i in range(10):
    s = s.replace("8", "88")

for i in range(10):
    s = s.replace("9", "99")

print(s[k-1])

n = int(input())
s = str(input())
k = str(input())
for i in range(n):
    if s[i] == k:
        s = s[:i] + s[i+1:]
print(s)


s = input()
k = int(input())

for i in range(20):
    s = s.replace("2", "22")
    s = s.replace("3", "333")
    s = s.replace("4", "4444")
    s = s.replace("5", "55555")
    s = s.replace("6", "666666")
    s = s.replace("7", "7777777")
    s = s.replace("8", "88888888")
    s = s.replace("9", "999999999")

print(s[k-1])
